t = int(raw_input().strip())

for _ in xrange(t):
    n = int(raw_input().strip())
    a = map(int, raw_input().strip().split())

    a.sort()
    b = []

    j = n-1

    for i in xrange(n/2):
        b.append(a[i])
        b.append(a[j])
        j -= 1

    if n % 2 == 1:
        b.append(a[n/2])

    print ' '.join(map(str, b))
